para: This chapter will tell you how to manage RAM memory and cache.
We start with some simple tools to display information about memory: free -omfree(1), toptop(1) and cat /proc/meminfo/proc/meminfo.
We continue with managing swap space, using terms like swappingswapping, pagingpaging and virtual memoryvirtual memory.
The last part is about using vmstat to monitor swap usage.
